name: MEC Mistral Pants - Youths
description:
Wear these cold-weather pants when you anticipate pushing hard. A windproof, breathable layer that suits fast moving skiers and winter runners. The moisture-wicking fabric used in the back panels is key to staying dry and warm.Front panel uses windproof polyester and polyurethane soft shell fabric, treated with DWR for water-resistance.Back panel is polyester and spandex with a flat outer face and brushed inner that wicks moisture.Flat-locked seams are smooth and soft against skin.Elastic waistband has a drawcord, for personalized fit.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
